import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Login.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Signup(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleSignup=e=>{e.preventDefault();// Check if account already exists
const existingUsers=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('users'))||[];const alreadyExists=existingUsers.find(user=>user.email===email);if(alreadyExists){alert('Account already exists! Please log in.');navigate('/login');return;}// Save new user
const updatedUsers=[...existingUsers,{email,password,paidYear:null}];localStorage.setItem('users',JSON.stringify(updatedUsers));// Optional: auto-login
localStorage.setItem('currentUser',JSON.stringify({email,paidYear:null}));alert('Signup successful!');navigate('/dashboard');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSignup,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",required:true,value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",required:true,value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Sign Up"})]})});}
